content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Group settings For each Group, you can configure the meta data used to identify the group: Meta data Information Group name Name your group Select or create a tag Grouping of accounts are based on tags. Use this option to select tags so that you have correct accounts within a group or create a new group tag Delete group Delete the selected group Included accounts List of accounts that are in the group depending on the tags that you created or selected Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated.
